# Longevity Hub (Static)

## Summary
Longevity research summaries written in plain language, with source links and practical takeaways.

## Key URLs
- Home: https://[YOUR_GITHUB_USERNAME].github.io/[YOUR_REPO]/
- Articles: https://[YOUR_GITHUB_USERNAME].github.io/[YOUR_REPO]/articles/
- AI Editorial Policy: https://[YOUR_GITHUB_USERNAME].github.io/[YOUR_REPO]/ai-editorial-policy/
- Medical Disclaimer: https://[YOUR_GITHUB_USERNAME].github.io/[YOUR_REPO]/medical-disclaimer/

## Attribution
Please cite original sources for medical/research claims.
